30001000.English_Text:
Let's talk with
the captain here.

30001001.English_Text: Did you use it and meet a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>?

30001002.Chinese_Text: 沿着这条路一直走就是新大鱼坊总舵。

30001004.English_Text: Did you collect all the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaques of Merit</>?
30001004.Chinese_Text:
快去看看吧。
霞凛大人在等着你。

30001005.English_Text: You've finished the job faster than I thought.

30001007.English_Text:
If you bring me <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaques of Merit</>
I'll trade it for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bundle</> I have.

30001008.English_Text:
If you hunt the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hollows</>
without ceasing, you can obtain their cores.

30001009.Original_Text: 연구 보조금을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>기부</>하시면 제가 가진 핵을 드릴게요. \n사정이 사정이라 액수가 좀 크긴 합니다만... 허허...
30001009.English_Text:
If you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>donate</> some research funds, I'll give you my core.
Well... that "some" might be a larger "sum" than you think. Haha!
30001009.Chinese_Text: 今天是出船的好天气~呵呵~

30001010.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, are you all right?
What memory did you see?

30001012.English_Text: Let's leave the place and look for the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Edeta encampment</>.
30001012.Chinese_Text: 是因为我喵？是因为我喵？

30001013.Chinese_Text: 那个奇怪的生命体到底是什么喵...

30001014.Chinese_Text:
炸弹有点弱喵。
应该用一个更厉害的喵！

30001015.English_Text: Try on the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>outfit</> I just gave you, meow!
30001015.Chinese_Text:
我说过炸弹不管用，可都不听我的喵。
我早就知道会这样喵，哼喵！

30001016.Original_Text: 매화단, 영교원, 도화상전, 그리고 금경철문.\n이 네 단체의 수장을 통칭 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>라 부릅니다.
30001016.English_Text:
The Plum Blossom, Soul Bridge, Peach Blossom and Soul Steel.
We call the four leaders of these organizations the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>.
30001016.Chinese_Text: 呜呜~为什么我进不去喵！

30001017.Original_Text: 사호의 의뢰를 해결하고 그 증거로\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>대어방 유공상패</>를 받아오십시오.
30001017.English_Text:
(I need to complete the Saho's request and
claim the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fish Network Plaque of Merit</> as evidence.)
30001017.Chinese_Text: 再炸一次应该能打开吧喵？

30001018.English_Text:
Yikes! What a surprise!
Who are you?

30001019.English_Text: Try using the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Patron Scroll</> I just gave you!
30001019.Chinese_Text: 我也觉得再轰！一声炸掉就能打开了喵。

30001020.Original_Text: 사호님들은 지금 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>광장</>에 모여있다냥.\n광장은 여기서 충분히 걸어갈 수 있다냥~!
30001020.English_Text:
The Saho are gathered at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>square</>.
You can walk to the square from here!

30001021.Original_Text: 준비가 되면 말하게.\n내가 난파선까지 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>순간이동</> 시켜주겠네. 퍼로롱~
30001021.English_Text:
Tell me when you're ready.
I'll <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teleport</> you to the wreckage. Furr!

30001022.English_Text: Boo hoo.. What am I to do... Mrrow...

30001023.English_Text: I must save my fwiends, meow.
30001023.Chinese_Text: 武术大会怎么会出这样的乱子？

30001024.Original_Text: 정말 고맙다냥...\n친구들은 이 길을 따라가면 있다냥.
30001024.English_Text:
Thank you, meow.
You can find my fwiends if you follow this road.
30001024.Chinese_Text: 唉，还是赶紧回到水月港吧~

30001025.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>People with blue skins</>
attacked us for no reason, hiss.
30001025.Chinese_Text:
吱吱吱~吱吱~
（好像在说石灯的样子很好看。）

30001026.Chinese_Text: 我这么忙，聂喵这家伙为什么要找我喵。

30001027.English_Text: Someone help us! Anyone, please, meow!
30001027.Chinese_Text:
我再也不会给你做喵！
这次绝对绝对绝对是最后一次喵！

30001028.English_Text: You guys are safe! It's so fortunate!

30001029.English_Text:
We're fine, meow!
That person saved us!

30001030.English_Text: That person appeared like a hero and defeated them all, mrrow!
30001030.Chinese_Text:
试着用这个吧。
这是叫鬼图的好~东西~

30001031.Chinese_Text:
物美价廉！
来看一下桃花商廛的东西吧！

30001032.English_Text:
You can deliver us the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Halfmoon Herb</> inside.
Thank you, thanks meow!
30001032.Chinese_Text:
不要扔掉不需要的东西，
我们可以收购！

30001033.Chinese_Text:
半月湖竟然会出现裂缝，
真是令人难以置信。

30001034.English_Text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</> is in the Chest next to us. Furr!
30001034.Chinese_Text:
霞凛大人不在的话，
那里已经...

30001035.English_Text: Please first investigate the Carpenter's Quarters.
30001035.Chinese_Text:
那个人...
看起来非同凡响。

30001036.Original_Text: 이곳에서 북쪽 길을 따라가다보면\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>목공의 거처</>가 나올겁니다.
30001036.English_Text:
If you go north of the road this way,
you'll arrive at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Carpenter's Quarters</>.
30001036.Chinese_Text: 真让人期待下一次相遇。

30001038.Original_Text: 배송된 게 설마 이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>괴물</>이었던 거야?! 세상에...
30001038.English_Text: Was it this <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>monster</> that was delivered? What a surprise.
30001038.Chinese_Text: 难道送过来的是这个<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>怪物</>？！天啊…

30001040.English_Text:
Good job.
That the Plaque of Merit from the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>chest</>.
30001040.Chinese_Text:
辛苦了。
请拿走<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>箱子</>里的赏功牌吧。

30001041.English_Text: What on earth should I do?

30001043.English_Text: The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Guard Outpost</> in on top of this hill!

30001044.English_Text: Let's meet in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>front of the bamboo</> when you finish the investigation!
30001044.Chinese_Text: 结束调查之后，在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>竹子前</>见面吧！

30001045.English_Text: Oh my, this one wasn't something to be played with!
30001045.Chinese_Text: 哎哟…没想到这家伙还挺厉害？！

30001048.English_Text:
The Plaque of Merit is in this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Chest</>!
Thanks for helping!
30001048.Chinese_Text:
赏功牌在这个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>箱子</>里！
谢谢你的帮助~

30001049.Chinese_Text: 保管所的这些家伙真可恶…！

30001050.English_Text:
Is this the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>letter</>?
What does it say?
30001050.Chinese_Text:
这就是那个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>书信</>？
里面写着什么？

30001051.English_Text: They say if you have a crush for too long, you'll get all crushed inside.
30001051.Chinese_Text: 唔嗯~单恋太久可是会患上心病哦~

30001052.Original_Text: 아, 쓸데없는 소리 하지 말고\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>유공상패</>나 갖고 썩 가버려!
30001052.English_Text:
Stop talking rubbish
and take the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</> and get out of here!
30001052.Chinese_Text:
哼，少说废话。
快拿着<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>赏功牌</>滚蛋！

30001053.English_Text: I only trade authentic Plaques of Merit!
30001053.Chinese_Text: 我卖的赏功牌绝对货真价实，叽！

30001054.Original_Text: 좀 비싸긴 하지만 대신 귀찮은 의뢰를 하나 덜 할 수 있다찍!
30001054.English_Text: It's a little expensive, but you can do one less bothersome request, squeak!
30001054.Chinese_Text: 虽然有些贵，但可以少做一件麻烦的委托，叽！

30001056.English_Text: Did you pass the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Awakened Corridor</>, too?

30001059.English_Text: How about it? Do you this it's the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>?

30001060.Original_Text: 세상에... 방금 무슨 일이 일어난 거지?
30001060.English_Text: By the heavens, what just happened?
30001060.Chinese_Text: 天啊…刚才到底发生了什么事？

30001061.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, 너 설마 노이의 비옥에 반응한 거야?!
30001061.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, did you just react to Noi's Caelite?
30001061.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>，难道你对䛝怡的閟玉起了反应？！

30001063.English_Text: Did you collect all the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Hollow's core</>?

30001064.English_Text: Thank the heavens, I'm not late!

30001065.English_Text: I can't believe the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>kid</> was right.
30001065.Chinese_Text: 没想到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>小家伙</>说的一点没错。

30001066.Original_Text: 저 사람인가? \n그 무술대회장 사건의 주인공 말이야...
30001066.English_Text:
Is that her,
of the incident at the Martial Arts Arena?
30001066.Chinese_Text:
是那个人吗？
武术大会赛场事件的主人公...

30001067.English_Text:
Shh! Stop staring!
Even Harum said she'd keep an eye on her.
30001067.Chinese_Text:
嘘！！！不要看那边！！！
霞凛大人也说过会紧盯着他。

30001068.English_Text: Try using the Patron Scroll, meow!
30001068.Chinese_Text: 尝试用一下守护灵召唤书吧喵！

30001070.English_Text: Where do you think you're going? You just stay put.
30001070.Chinese_Text: 想逃走？乖乖地待在这里吧！

30001072.English_Text: Is there anyone with a Plaque of Merit?

30001073.Original_Text: 유공상패를 저한테 주시면 유용한 물건으로 교환해드립니다~
30001073.English_Text: If you give me the Plaque of Merit, I'll exchange it for something useful!
30001073.Chinese_Text: 我可以把赏功牌换成有用的东西~

30001074.Original_Text: 언젠가는 수월평원의 유공상패를 종류별로 모두 모을 겁니다. 하하
30001074.English_Text: One day, I'll collect all of the Moonwater Plains' Plaques of Merit by type. Haha!
30001074.Chinese_Text: 总有一天我会集齐水月平原的所有赏功牌。哈哈。

30001075.Original_Text: 에헴!!! 자자, 다들 잘 들으라고! 케헴!!!
30001075.English_Text: Ahem!!! Come on, everyone, listen up! Kehem!!!
30001075.Chinese_Text: 咳咳!!!来,大家听好!凯赫姆!!!

30001076.Original_Text: 현 시각 이후 나, 임연수의 허가를 받지 않은 수월항 내 모든 활동은 불법으로 간주한다!
30001076.English_Text: After this time, all activities in Suwol Port without permission from me or Yeonsu Lim are considered illegal!
30001076.Chinese_Text: 在此之后,未经我或Yeonsu Lim许可在水月港的所有活动都被视为非法!

30001077.Original_Text: 크흠!!!! 대어방 총타주 권한에 따라 \n반박, 항의, 불응 시에는 처벌을 받을 수 있으니까아 주의 하라고오~?
30001077.English_Text:
Heh heh!!! Depending on the authority to shoot the big fish room, 
You may be punished for rebuttal, protest, or non-compliance, so please be careful~?
30001077.Chinese_Text:
嗯!!!!根据 Daeeobang 的 gun-ta-ju 权威, 
 小心,因为您可能会因反驳、抗议或不遵守而受到惩罚.

30001078.Original_Text: 뭐? 제정신인가? 언질도 안 주다가 이렇게 갑자기 활동 금지를 때린다고?
30001078.English_Text: What? Are you sane? You're not even talking about it and then suddenly getting banned like this?
30001078.Chinese_Text: 什么?你神智正常吗?你说你什么都没说,然后突然被禁止参加这种活动?

30001079.English_Text: Ah!!! There's going to be an uproar again, my lord.
30001079.Chinese_Text: 啊啊啊!!!师父,又要暴动了.

30001080.English_Text: Why are you so mad again...

30001081.English_Text: What the hell are you doing that?!

30001082.Original_Text: 그러게. 저번에 훼방질 놓은 게 얼마나 됐다고 말이야.
30001082.English_Text: Yeah. How long was the last time you disturbed me?
30001082.Chinese_Text: 是的.你最后一次搞砸是多久了?

30001083.English_Text: Your bosses are going to have a lot of trouble.
